Title: DragonHeart
Writer: Patrick Read Johnson (story by), Charles Edward Pogue (story by), Charles Edward Pogue (screenplay by)
Actors: Dennis Quaid, David Thewlis, Pete Postlethwaite, Dina Meyer
Plot: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying Knight must cooperate to stop an evil King, who was given partial immortality.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.
